Cool Juli. Glad you got yours running better. I like seeing everyones ideas being so fruitful for them. 
   
  Misty

Jules <ghostchasingfool@...> wrote:
          I was having trouble today getting any good signals with the RS Hacked 
box. Upon trying to figure out just where to do my sessions this 
afternoon, I had a idea. Call me crazy but I plugged my camcorder cord 
into the imputs on the back of my tv and into the hacked! The sound 
clarity was amazing!!! It is amplied 10 times the amount from the 
computer and if you place the recorder next to the surround sound, it 
picks everything up.

Has anyone else tried this? Please let me know?

Juli
